segments.text: Oh no, the water is everywhere, and the woman is just standing there, doing nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so detached from what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel really sorry for her; she must be going through something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being naughty, but they don't realize the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far; he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could help them, but I don't know how.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and it's only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so helpless watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but I'm not sure it will.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is really tugging at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR
